import React, { Component } from 'react'; import '../styles/Foundations.css'; import Nav from '../components/Nav'; import foundations from '../images/foundations.png'; import gold from '../images/gold.png'; import handson1 from '../images/handson1.jpg'; import handson2 from '../images/handson2.jpg'; import handson3 from '../images/handson3.jpg'; const Foundations = (props) => { return (

Foundations

This course seeks to teach students the basics of fading, scissor work, and beard work. The Foundations course will consist of a two-day workshop followed by a three month mentorship period in which students can book private sessions with the mentors.

{/*

Hands-on Practice

Students will have the opportunity to practice the fundamentals during and after the workshop through private sessions with the mentors.

Toolkit Included

Students will be provided a toolkit consisting of

Wahl Magic clip
Andis Slimline Pro | Andis Profoil
Styling comb | Flat top comb
Scissors | Straight razor
Barber cape
Spray bottle

*/}
) } export default Foundations;
